item.title: Version 0.0.5
item.description:
## What's New
### Automatic Updates Cliparoo now automatically checks for updates in the background, so you'll always know when a new version is available.
- **Automatic update checks** - Cliparoo will periodically check for new versions (every 24 hours) - **User control** - Enable or disable automatic checks in Settings > About - **Manual check** - Use the "Check for Updates" button anytime to check on demand
Your update preferences are saved and persist across app restarts and updates.
